briefTitle: A 12-month, Randomized, Efficacy and Safety Study of 0.5 mg Ranibizumab vs Laser in Chinese Diabetic Macular Edema (DME) Patients
officialTitle: A 12-month, Randomized, Double-masked, Multicenter, Laser-controlled Phase III Study Assessing the Efficacy and Safety of 0.5 mg Ranibizumab Dosed PRN in Subjects With Visual Impairment Due to Diabetic Macular Edema in Chinese Patients
summary: Study of efficacy and safety of 0.5 mg ranibizumab in Chinese patients with diabetic macular edema (DME)

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Average Change From Baseline in Best-Corrected Visual Acuity (BCVA) (Letters) to Month 1 Through 12
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline, Monthly from Month 1 through Month 12
